review: I love this! We bought the firestick primarily to put XBMC/Kodi on. The firestick is very fast and responsive. It runs all apps very easily and is perfect for watching Amazon Instant Video. It is very simple to connect to your TV or computer and I really like the remote that comes with the firestick. It is very responsive and comfortable to use. I would definitely recommend this product.
